member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.Cache.CacheInterceptor
member.summary: Caches the return value of the intercepted method.

member.name: M:Castle.Facilities.Cache.CacheInterceptor.Intercept(Castle.Core.Interceptor.IInvocation)
member.summary: Returns from the cache provider the value saved with the key generated using the specified IMethodInvocation. If the object is not found in the cache, the intercepted method is executed and its returned value is saved in the cached and returned by this method.
member.param: the description of the intercepted method.
member.returns: the object stored in the cache.
